TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner

Docs.summary: Serves as the base class for designers that provide design-time support in the Visual Web Designer for controls that are derived from the abstract class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 在 Visual Web 設計工具中，當使用者從來源切換到設計檢視中，描述控制項的標記原始碼衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>類別會剖析，並在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。 當使用者切換回原始碼檢視中時，設計階段控制項就會保存標記原始程式碼，並編輯成 Web 網頁的標記。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別做為衍生自的控制項提供設計階段支援，在 Visual Web 設計工具的設計工具的基底類別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>。
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別屬性會提供下列功能：
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A>屬性會傳回<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>物件，其通常包含物件，衍生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>繼承樹狀結構的設計工具中的每個層級的物件。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A>屬性可存取衍生自控制項的對應屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>類別。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A>表示欄位的資料來源提供的文字，且分別值的清單項目內容。
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別方法會提供下列功能：
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>方法繫結相關聯的控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>設計階段資料來源。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法會傳回用來呈現關聯的控制項設計階段的標記。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>方法會傳回在設計階段<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>元件從關聯的控制項容器。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>控制項容器中，從已解析為設計階段<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A>控制項的屬性。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法準備設計工具，以檢視和設計關聯的控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>方法時，會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>針對關聯的控制項已變更。
- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>方法用來移除其他屬性、 加入其他屬性，或遮蔽關聯控制項衍生自屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>。
## Examples 本節提供兩個程式碼範例。 第一個範例示範如何衍生自訂控制項設計工具。 第二個示範如何將衍生的控制項與設計工具產生關聯。
下列程式碼範例示範如何建立一個名為`SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別。 `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`類別覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>方法。 `SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`類別顯示`SimpleRadioButtonList`設計介面上的控制項。
[!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#1)]
下列程式碼範例衍生`SimpleRadioButtonList`控制項從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控制項，並示範如何使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>類別相關聯`SimpleRadioButtonList`具有它的設計工具控制項`SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner`類別。
[!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonList.cs#5)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlist.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別時，它會建立關聯的控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>設計介面上的類別。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ActionLists As DesignerActionListCollection

Docs.summary: Gets the designer action list collection for the designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void DataBind(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub DataBind (dataBoundControl As BaseDataBoundControl)

Docs.param: The associated control derived from the , or a copy of that control.
Docs.summary: Binds the specified control to the design-time data source.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner>基底類別，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>方法會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>物件參考的設計階段資料來源，然後呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，然後還原<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>屬性為其原始值。
如<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別，不過，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataBind%2A>方法會有任何功能，因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>物件只加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataTextField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataTextField : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the data text field of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataTextField%2A>屬性可設定或擷取用於在執行階段控制項的設計階段表示標記。 這會提供透過設計工具，以存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>關聯的控制項，對應於提供清單項目的文字內容的資料來源欄位的屬性。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataValueField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataValueField : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the data value field of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.DataValueField%2A>屬性可提供透過設計工具，以存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>表示的資料來源提供值內容的清單項目欄位相關聯控制項的屬性。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

Docs.summary: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
Docs.returns: A containing the markup used to render the control derived from the at design time.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果相關聯的控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>物件是資料繫結，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法清除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合，並將<xref:System.String>訊息，表示控制項繫結的資料。 如果相關聯的控制項不是資料繫結和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合是空的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>新增<xref:System.String>訊息，表示未繫結控制項。 然後，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>呼叫其基底方法，以產生標記。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例將覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法來自訂顯示在設計介面上的相關聯控制項的標記。 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BackColor%2A>屬性未定義相關聯的控制項，它會設定為`Gainsboro`，並顯示控制項的背景色彩。 這麼做的基底實作之後<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法呼叫。
這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別。
[!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.IEnumerable GetResolvedSelectedDataSource() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the data source component from the associated control container, resolved to a specific data member.
Docs.returns: An containing the design-time , resolved to the of the associated control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>方法會傳回`null`如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>找不到屬性，或如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>不具有相同的名稱。
如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>無法解析為<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner.DataMember%2A>屬性相關聯的控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>傳回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>包含設計階段介面<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object GetSelectedDataSource() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the data source component from the associated control container.
Docs.returns: An object implementing an interface and containing the design-time of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>方法會傳回`null`如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>找不到屬性，或如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.DataSource%2A>不具有相同的名稱。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

Docs.param: A control derived from the that implements an .
Docs.summary: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 設計工具主應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法時，就可以使用設計工具來呈現控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>類別。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>以及其基底方法設定屬性，並連接至所需的設計工具的作業事件。
`component`參數是衍生自控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>，是與這個設計工具相關聯或該控制項的複本。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例將覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.Initialize%2A>方法，在設計工具中衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別，以確保只有控制項類別的執行個體名稱`SimpleRadioButtonList`所使用的自訂設計工具。
這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別。
[!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#3)]

Docs.summary: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDataSourceChanged() cil managed

Docs.summary: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>相關聯的控制項衍生自的基底方法連接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>目前的資料來源的物件，如果控制項已連線到資料來源不同，更新的設計階段標記。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>方法後連接到目前的資料來源的更新設計階段標記。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例將覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>繼承自一個類別中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別。 當資料來源也就是相關聯的設計工具類別，變更，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>呼叫方法時，此程式碼會設定名為的變數`changedDataSource`至`true`。
這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別。
[!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnDataSourceChanged(bool forceUpdateView) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnDataSourceChanged (forceUpdateView As Boolean)

Docs.param: A that indicates whether the design-time markup is to be unconditionally updated. This parameter is ignored.
Docs.summary: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>相關聯的控制項衍生自的基底方法連接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>類別目前的資料來源，而且，如果控制項已連線到資料來源不同，更新的設計階段標記。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>後連接到目前的資料來源設計工具的方法無條件地將更新過的設計階段標記。 值`forceUpdateView`會被忽略。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例將覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>繼承自一個類別中的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別。 當資料來源也就是相關聯的設計工具類別，變更，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>呼叫此程式碼會設定名為的變數和`changedDataSource`至`true`。
這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner>類別。
[!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdesigner.vb#4)]

block.para: 呼叫端應該使用公用覆寫。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

Docs.param: A collection implementing the of the added or shadowed properties to expose for the associated control at design time.
Docs.summary: Used by the designer to remove additional properties from or add properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 控制項設計工具使用的方法，以衍生自<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来遮蔽各種控制項屬性與對應的設計階段屬性在設計工具實作，並將屬性加入到或從其中移除屬性**屬性**方格。
衍生自控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>新增<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataFieldConverter>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>相關聯控制項的屬性。

block.para: 覆寫方法，以將屬性加入到或變更設計階段屬性集合中屬性的屬性。請務必呼叫基底方法，然後再執行其他處理。

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UseDataSourcePickerActionList As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UseDataSourcePickerActionList { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the associated control should render its default action lists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDesigner.UseDataSourcePickerActionList%2A>屬性會傳回`false`，讓資料來源下拉式清單中不會顯示與**選擇資料來源**中的功能表項目**一般工作**操作功能表。 相反地，此功能表項目會顯示**選擇資料來源**對話方塊，讓使用者選取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>屬性。

block.para: 覆寫屬性，以傳回如果您要衍生自控制項類別來顯示資料來源下拉式清單中的 * * 選擇資料來源 * * 中的功能表項目 * * 在設計階段常見工作 * * 內容功能表。
